description: Object used to track the status of a backup or restore.

status.description: The daemon status can be one of the following enumerations
status.name: DaemonStatus

type.description: The daemon type can be one of the following enumerations
type.name: DaemonType

id.description: The id assigned to the deamon processes.

startedBy.description: The user that started the deamon.

startedOn.description: The date-time when the daemon was started.

progresssMessage.description: The current message of the progress tracker.

progresssCurrent.description: The progress current value indicates how much progress has been made. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

progresssTotal.description: The progress total indicates the total amount of work to complete. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

errorMessage.description: This is a one line error message.

errorDetails.description: This is the full stack trace of the error.

backupUrl.description: After a backup is completed this URL will point to the backup file. For a restore, this URL will point to the backup file being used to drive the restore daemon.

totalTimeMS.description: The total run time (MS) of the daemon
